1.text: Use 3-10 drops of oil depending on how long you’ve been growing your beard.

2.text: Apply beard oil every 2 days if your beard is short.

3.text: Use beard oil daily if you live in an area with a dry climate.

4.text: Shower and dry your beard before applying beard oil.

5.text: Squeeze the appropriate amount of beard oil into your palm.

6.text: Spread the oil evenly across your palms and fingers.

7.text: Brush the palms of your hands along the sides of your beard.

8.text: Drag your fingers down the front of your beard.

9.text: Run your fingers up through the bottom of your beard.

10.text: Coat your mustache hair with your fingertips.

11.text: Purchase a wooden beard comb for the best results.

12.text: Comb your beard starting from the bottom to the top.

13.text: Drag your comb downward through your beard.

14.text: Avoid combing more than 3 times a day.
